ABOUT ME

My name is Fadzilah Whyte.

I am a full-stack web developer and enjoy learning new trends.

I am developing user interfaces in JavaScript and React and backend of my projects in PHP and Laravel.

I am open to learning new technologies and enjoy working with people who are as passionate about all web-related as me.

I have worked for clients all across the world but currently I am based in Aberdeen,Scotland, United Kingdom.

I like cats, gaming, and snowboarding. If I do not develop, you can also meet me trekking in the mountains.

Get in touch and let's do something great together.
